Text: Lansing Center, officially the Lansing Convention Center, is the primary and largest convention center in Lansing, Michigan.

Text: Lansing Center:  Since 1996, Lansing Center has been managed by the non-profit Lansing Entertainment & Public Facilities Authority (LEPFA).
